step in the right direction for Predator movies at last.","reviewBody":"Before I took a chance on this film there was really only one question I wanted answered...

'Is this film going to be another steaming pile of disappointment like the AVP films?'

And the answer, happily, is 'No', though after having to sift through all the unhelpful and uninformative 1 rater reviews here, I never would have guessed. I almost gave this film a miss, but I'm glad I didn't. It was actually quite good, and I'll tell you why (no spoilers I promise). 

I think it is important to go into this film with the right expectations. This film returns to the original Predator format, and borrows heavily from the first 1987 Predator film. There are scenes and characters (and even weapons) which are so reminiscent of the first film that they would not be out of place in a remake. I like to view this as very deliberate homage to the original rather than shameless plagiarism, and I enjoyed the film more and feel much happier because of it. Of course this is not a remake. It is a sequel with some major differences from the 1987 film, and enough originality to make it interesting and unique in its own right.

The story is not overly ambitious, they play it straight and the focus is given more to building tension, which it manages to do very well. Because it is a Predator film you kind of know what is going to happen, but it still manages to be suspenseful from the start, and there are quite a few surprises and twists along the way to keep you guessing. The unnerving way the truth of their situation unfolds for the characters is quite enthralling, and reminded me strongly of shows like 'The Outer Limits'.

The characters are interesting and all of them are well portrayed. Some are a little cliché, but the main character played by Adrien Brody is actually more human and teeters on the edge of being a full blown anti- hero. 

My only major gripe with this film is that there is little character development. The characters are (as I said) interesting, but there just doesn't seem to be enough time to explore them very deeply. The most you really get is a shallow glimpse of who they might be, which left question marks over some of their motivations. This does make the film slightly forgettable, as you never really end up feeling or caring too much for them, and sometime it feels like they do things just to drive the plot/action forward, rather than because it is something their character might do.

Overall I would give the film a 7 out of 10, it was above average for and action flick and screamed quality, despite a retentively low budget, and I definitely wouldn't mind going to see it again. programme.title: The Howling
Urlikanje
programme.desc:
The Howling: Directed by Joe Dante. With Dee Wallace, Patrick Macnee, Dennis Dugan, Christopher Stone. After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082533/","name":"The Howling","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcwZmIyNjAtMWM4Yy00YzE1LTk5YzQtNjVlY2IxNzMwNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908914/","name":"Dee Wallace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001495/","name":"Patrick Macnee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001102/","name":"Joe Dante"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066648/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024716/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065795/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104707/","name":"Gary Brandner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000626/","name":"John Sayles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935288/","name":"Terence H. Winkless"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Howling","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2646454297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for The Howling"},"datePublished":"1981-04-10","description":"After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.","keywords":"werewolf,silver bullet,psychiatrist,forest,female full frontal nudity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082533/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan-10075"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Funny Werewolf Flick","reviewBody":"This might be if not my favourite werewolf movie is right up there on a very short list. Joe Dante after scaring audiences in going into the water (much like Steven Spielberg before him) with PIRANHA he was given the chance to direct a werewolf movie. Based on a novel by Gary Brandner, which I have read and I must say the film is (and this is rare) way better than the book. Screenwriter John Sayles (who also has a cameo in this film) was brought in to rewrite a script by Terence H. Winkless. What he did was add wonderful humour, characters and nods to horror that werewolf fans should enjoy.

Dee Wallace plays Karen White, who is a news reporter. Wallace I think does a great job in the role and is really able to effectively play the character she is portraying. She is on the trail of an LA serial killer called Eddie Quist (super creepy and dark portrayal by Robert Picardo). She is almost killed by Quist, so her shrink Dr. George Waggner (Patrick Macnee) suggests she go to a retreat where he sends some of his patients for treatment. So, Karen along with her husband (played by her real-life hubby Christopher Stone in a great performance) to the retreat. Problem is this is where the Quist family lives along with a gang of werewolves.

I really do think this early 80s horror flick is wonderfully lit, excellent use of fog and also has some awesome music from Italian composer Pino Donaggio.

1981 was the year of the werewolf movie as John Landis' AN AMERICAN WEREWOLF IN LONDON (which is generally held in an even higher regard by most) and WOLFEN came out that same year. Rob Bottin did the effects for this movie and I think only 21 at the time shows how marvellous he was at creating special effects as this was I think the very first on-screen transformation into a werewolf in film history. Now some of the effects in the film have not aged the best, but some stand wonderfully as they did when the film was first released.

There are also some cameos in the film such as Dante's old boss Roger Corman, Famous Monster magazine founder Forrest J. Ackerman and future horror director Mick Garris. Also has quite a great cast including Dennis Dugan, Kevin McCarthy, John Carradine and Slim Pickens to name a few.

So, if you are a werewolf fan, enjoy some humour mixed in with your horror and like the old ways horror flicks were made with effects I would highly suggest watching this film. Sadly, followed by an endless parade of bad sequels.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32228,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tremors
Podrhtavanje
programme.desc:
Tremors: Directed by Ron Underwood. With Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross. Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100814/","name":"Tremors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNjkwMzIyMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDI2NTU5ODYx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141617/","name":"Finn Carter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033220/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651256/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534681/","name":"Brent Maddock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.","keywords":"desert,monster,giant worm,stranded on rooftop,first part","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wez-1"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has 'cult classic' written all over it.","reviewBody":"This movie caught me by surprise: I worked in a video store, and one day we got a preview tape of this movie, prior to its video release. I hadn't heard much about it, so I watched it, and was quite surprised at how enjoyable it was. Since then, I have seen the movie about ten more times (at least), and still get a kick out of it.

Tremors is basically a landlocked variation on 'Jaws' and those 1950s giant bug movies: the isolated town of Perfection, Nevada (population 16), finds itself under seige by four monstrous, subterranean wormlike creatures, that hunt by sensing vibrations in the ground. The plot revolves around the townspeople trying to outwit and escape the creatures (dubbed 'Graboids'), which are tearing the town out from under them.

What really makes the movie work is the characters: all of them come across as real people trapped in an insane situation, and all have a lot of charisma, even though the film doesn't have tons of character development. Kevin Bacon and Fred Ward are a hoot as a pair of low-rent handymen who become reluctant heroes. The byplay between the two is a lot of fun.

Usually movies like this revolve around stupid people doing stupid things, just to raise the body count. Tremors is different: the characters react believably, and do smart things to try and escape and/or kill the Graboids. The creatures too are also fairly smart, and are not just mindless eating machines with no brains.

Given its premise, Tremors is not a gory or violent film (although it has a couple of minor gross bits), and has a very good sense of humor. The film-makers are aware of their far-fetched premise (a couple of key questions go unanswered), but they treat it with respect and a certain amount of affection.

Tremors didn't have much life in theaters, but has become something of a 'Midnight Movie' on home video, with definite cult possibilities. Check it out, and don't be surprised if you end up buying it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0100814, Title: Tremors, --- Description: Tremors: Directed by Ron Underwood. With Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross. Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100814/","name":"Tremors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNjkwMzIyMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDI2NTU5ODYx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141617/","name":"Finn Carter"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033220/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651256/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534681/","name":"Brent Maddock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"],"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.","keywords":"desert,monster,giant worm,stranded on rooftop,first part","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100814/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Wez-1","dateCreated":"2001-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has 'cult classic' written all over it.","reviewBody":"This movie caught me by surprise: I worked in a video store, and one day we got a preview tape of this movie, prior to its video release. I hadn't heard much about it, so I watched it, and was quite surprised at how enjoyable it was. Since then, I have seen the movie about ten more times (at least), and still get a kick out of it.

Tremors is basically a landlocked variation on 'Jaws' and those 1950s giant bug movies: the isolated town of Perfection, Nevada (population 16), finds itself under seige by four monstrous, subterranean wormlike creatures, that hunt by sensing vibrations in the ground. The plot revolves around the townspeople trying to outwit and escape the creatures (dubbed 'Graboids'), which are tearing the town out from under them.

What really makes the movie work is the characters: all of them come across as real people trapped in an insane situation, and all have a lot of charisma, even though the film doesn't have tons of character development. Kevin Bacon and Fred Ward are a hoot as a pair of low-rent handymen who become reluctant heroes. The byplay between the two is a lot of fun.

Usually movies like this revolve around stupid people doing stupid things, just to raise the body count. Tremors is different: the characters react believably, and do smart things to try and escape and/or kill the Graboids. The creatures too are also fairly smart, and are not just mindless eating machines with no brains.

Given its premise, Tremors is not a gory or violent film (although it has a couple of minor gross bits), and has a very good sense of humor. The film-makers are aware of their far-fetched premise (a couple of key questions go unanswered), but they treat it with respect and a certain amount of affection.

Tremors didn't have much life in theaters, but has become something of a 'Midnight Movie' on home video, with definite cult possibilities. Check it out, and don't be surprised if you end up buying it.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

How embarrassing for this director and for all of these actors..times are hard but come on-have some dignity! I knew what to expect watching another Wrong Turn movie. I wasn't expecting it to be on the same wavelength as Texas Chainsaw or anything but I expected a little bit of entertainment. Unfortunately, all I got was some hot sex scenes and cheesy blood and gore with masks that my 4 year old could make in daycare. How disappointing for Wrong Turn. In my eyes, nothing will be better than the first one and it should have stopped at the first one.\n\nThere wasn't any character development at all (I know you don't expect that much in scary movies but there was nothing), their actions were the antithesis of what any person with common sense would have done, there wasn't enough back story to really fill us in on how this started, it was just a hot mess! Do not waste your time watching this!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23797,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.","keywords":"australia,brother brother relationship,money,post apocalypse,road trip","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2345737/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maiveh-263-654104"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pattinson's Best Performance Ever","reviewBody":"I was very motivated to watch this movie because I truly admire Pattinson as a full on artist. I had the feeling his performance was going to be good,but I honestly didn't expect "great", and I was so taken over by it! I'm happy he had this chance to show he it's not "just a handsome face". After this performance powerful yet subtle and mighty professional, Pattinson shows what he is made of. I hope after this he gets more roles and invitations to work for serious movies. He reminds me of both DiCaprio and Pitt at the beginning of their careers. Guy's performance was off the charts. Don't miss his expression on th last 10 minutes of the movie. It's of the best I have seen him deliver. I believe this movie will never be a crowd pleaser because it is way too artistic to be popular, there a many symbols and allegories to losses that will be missed... It's a work of art though. Perseverance pays off Mr. Pattinson. Keep up the good work and good luck.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45664,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

How embarrassing for this director and for all of these actors..times are hard but come on-have some dignity! I knew what to expect watching another Wrong Turn movie. I wasn't expecting it to be on the same wavelength as Texas Chainsaw or anything but I expected a little bit of entertainment. Unfortunately, all I got was some hot sex scenes and cheesy blood and gore with masks that my 4 year old could make in daycare. How disappointing for Wrong Turn. In my eyes, nothing will be better than the first one and it should have stopped at the first one.\n\nThere wasn't any character development at all (I know you don't expect that much in scary movies but there was nothing), their actions were the antithesis of what any person with common sense would have done, there wasn't enough back story to really fill us in on how this started, it was just a hot mess! I had the feeling his performance was going to be good,but I honestly didn't expect "great", and I was so taken over by it! I'm happy he had this chance to show he it's not "just a handsome face". After this performance powerful yet subtle and mighty professional, Pattinson shows what he is made of. I hope after this he gets more roles and invitations to work for serious movies. He reminds me of both DiCaprio and Pitt at the beginning of their careers. Guy's performance was off the charts. Don't miss his expression on th last 10 minutes of the movie. It's of the best I have seen him deliver. I believe this movie will never be a crowd pleaser because it is way too artistic to be popular, there a many symbols and allegories to losses that will be missed... It's a work of art though. Perseverance pays off Mr. Pattinson. programme.title: The Howling
Urlikanje
programme.desc:
The Howling: Directed by Joe Dante. With Dee Wallace, Patrick Macnee, Dennis Dugan, Christopher Stone. After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0082533/","name":"The Howling","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTcwZmIyNjAtMWM4Yy00YzE1LTk5YzQtNjVlY2IxNzMwNzc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908914/","name":"Dee Wallace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001495/","name":"Patrick Macnee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240797/","name":"Dennis Dugan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001102/","name":"Joe Dante"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066648/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024716/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065795/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104707/","name":"Gary Brandner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000626/","name":"John Sayles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935288/","name":"Terence H. Winkless"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Howling","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2646454297","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE4ZDBjNGItNzFmZS00MTAyLTgwOTctMGYzMjM3YTRkYTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for The Howling"},"datePublished":"1981-04-10","description":"After a bizarre and near deadly encounter with a serial killer, a television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort whose residents may not be what they seem.","keywords":"werewolf,silver bullet,psychiatrist,forest,female full frontal nudity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0082533/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ryan-10075"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Funny Werewolf Flick","reviewBody":"This might be if not my favourite werewolf movie is right up there on a very short list. Joe Dante after scaring audiences in going into the water (much like Steven Spielberg before him) with PIRANHA he was given the chance to direct a werewolf movie. Based on a novel by Gary Brandner, which I have read and I must say the film is (and this is rare) way better than the book. Screenwriter John Sayles (who also has a cameo in this film) was brought in to rewrite a script by Terence H. Winkless. What he did was add wonderful humour, characters and nods to horror that werewolf fans should enjoy.

Dee Wallace plays Karen White, who is a news reporter. Wallace I think does a great job in the role and is really able to effectively play the character she is portraying. She is on the trail of an LA serial killer called Eddie Quist (super creepy and dark portrayal by Robert Picardo). She is almost killed by Quist, so her shrink Dr. George Waggner (Patrick Macnee) suggests she go to a retreat where he sends some of his patients for treatment. So, Karen along with her husband (played by her real-life hubby Christopher Stone in a great performance) to the retreat. Problem is this is where the Quist family lives along with a gang of werewolves.

I really do think this early 80s horror flick is wonderfully lit, excellent use of fog and also has some awesome music from Italian composer Pino Donaggio.

1981 was the year of the werewolf movie as John Landis' AN AMERICAN WEREWOLF IN LONDON (which is generally held in an even higher regard by most) and WOLFEN came out that same year. Rob Bottin did the effects for this movie and I think only 21 at the time shows how marvellous he was at creating special effects as this was I think the very first on-screen transformation into a werewolf in film history. Now some of the effects in the film have not aged the best, but some stand wonderfully as they did when the film was first released.

There are also some cameos in the film such as Dante's old boss Roger Corman, Famous Monster magazine founder Forrest J. Ackerman and future horror director Mick Garris. Also has quite a great cast including Dennis Dugan, Kevin McCarthy, John Carradine and Slim Pickens to name a few.

So, if you are a werewolf fan, enjoy some humour mixed in with your horror and like the old ways horror flicks were made with effects I would highly suggest watching this film. Sadly, followed by an endless parade of bad sequels.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32228,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tremors
Podrhtavanje
programme.desc:
Tremors: Directed by Ron Underwood. With Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross. Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100814/","name":"Tremors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNjkwMzIyMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDI2NTU5ODYx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141617/","name":"Finn Carter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033220/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651256/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534681/","name":"Brent Maddock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"}],"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.","keywords":"desert,monster,giant worm,stranded on rooftop,first part","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100814/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Wez-1"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has 'cult classic' written all over it.","reviewBody":"This movie caught me by surprise: I worked in a video store, and one day we got a preview tape of this movie, prior to its video release. I hadn't heard much about it, so I watched it, and was quite surprised at how enjoyable it was. Since then, I have seen the movie about ten more times (at least), and still get a kick out of it.

Tremors is basically a landlocked variation on 'Jaws' and those 1950s giant bug movies: the isolated town of Perfection, Nevada (population 16), finds itself under seige by four monstrous, subterranean wormlike creatures, that hunt by sensing vibrations in the ground. The plot revolves around the townspeople trying to outwit and escape the creatures (dubbed 'Graboids'), which are tearing the town out from under them.

What really makes the movie work is the characters: all of them come across as real people trapped in an insane situation, and all have a lot of charisma, even though the film doesn't have tons of character development. Kevin Bacon and Fred Ward are a hoot as a pair of low-rent handymen who become reluctant heroes. The byplay between the two is a lot of fun.

Usually movies like this revolve around stupid people doing stupid things, just to raise the body count. Tremors is different: the characters react believably, and do smart things to try and escape and/or kill the Graboids. The creatures too are also fairly smart, and are not just mindless eating machines with no brains.

Given its premise, Tremors is not a gory or violent film (although it has a couple of minor gross bits), and has a very good sense of humor. The film-makers are aware of their far-fetched premise (a couple of key questions go unanswered), but they treat it with respect and a certain amount of affection.

Tremors didn't have much life in theaters, but has become something of a 'Midnight Movie' on home video, with definite cult possibilities. Check it out, and don't be surprised if you end up buying it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0100814, Title: Tremors, --- Description: Tremors: Directed by Ron Underwood. With Kevin Bacon, Fred Ward, Finn Carter, Michael Gross. Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100814/","name":"Tremors","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNjkwMzIyMjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDI2NTU5ODYx._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Horror"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911542/","name":"Fred Ward","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0141617/","name":"Finn Carter"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033220/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651256/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934093/","name":"S.S. Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534681/","name":"Brent Maddock","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881038/","name":"Ron Underwood"],"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.","keywords":"desert,monster,giant worm,stranded on rooftop,first part","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100814/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Wez-1","dateCreated":"2001-03-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Has 'cult classic' written all over it.","reviewBody":"This movie caught me by surprise: I worked in a video store, and one day we got a preview tape of this movie, prior to its video release. I hadn't heard much about it, so I watched it, and was quite surprised at how enjoyable it was. Since then, I have seen the movie about ten more times (at least), and still get a kick out of it.

Tremors is basically a landlocked variation on 'Jaws' and those 1950s giant bug movies: the isolated town of Perfection, Nevada (population 16), finds itself under seige by four monstrous, subterranean wormlike creatures, that hunt by sensing vibrations in the ground. The plot revolves around the townspeople trying to outwit and escape the creatures (dubbed 'Graboids'), which are tearing the town out from under them.

What really makes the movie work is the characters: all of them come across as real people trapped in an insane situation, and all have a lot of charisma, even though the film doesn't have tons of character development. Kevin Bacon and Fred Ward are a hoot as a pair of low-rent handymen who become reluctant heroes. The byplay between the two is a lot of fun.

Usually movies like this revolve around stupid people doing stupid things, just to raise the body count. Tremors is different: the characters react believably, and do smart things to try and escape and/or kill the Graboids. The creatures too are also fairly smart, and are not just mindless eating machines with no brains.

Given its premise, Tremors is not a gory or violent film (although it has a couple of minor gross bits), and has a very good sense of humor. The film-makers are aware of their far-fetched premise (a couple of key questions go unanswered), but they treat it with respect and a certain amount of affection.

Tremors didn't have much life in theaters, but has become something of a 'Midnight Movie' on home video, with definite cult possibilities. Check it out, and don't be surprised if you end up buying it.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

violence","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454841/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DaynaSu"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't watch it right before bed!","reviewBody":"My husband did not make it past the first hour of this movie. I had to watch the rest alone. It is psychologically terrifying...one of those movies that takes hold of you, makes you scream at the screen, and leaves you with a disturbed feeling for hours after the final credits roll. There was nothing profound about the premise, and nothing Oscar-worthy about the acting, but it was an all-around great horror film. The special effects were good...lots of gore and violence. It's suspenseful, dark, and is guaranteed to leave you with a creepy feeling that won't let you go to sleep right after watching it. I watched three hours of SEINFELD reruns, and had nightmares anyway. That's the way it should be! ;)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161711,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

Wrong Turn 5: Bloodlines: Directed by Declan O'Brien. With Doug Bradley, Camilla Arfwedson, Simon Ginty, Roxanne McKee. A group of college students, on a trip to the Mountain Man Festival on Halloween in West Virginia, encounter a clan of cannibals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2375779/","name":"Wrong Turn 5: Bloodlines","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNlMTUyYzgtMTRhYS00YmM0LWJjMGItYzA5NThkZmMxNWM0L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0103208/","name":"Doug Bradley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2268310/","name":"Camilla Arfwedson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5025384/","name":"Simon Ginty"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639508/","name":"Declan O'Brien"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639508/","name":"Declan O'Brien"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0568416/","name":"Alan B. McElroy"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Wrong Turn 5: Bloodlines","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1812898841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjFmZWJhNTctMWFmNC00MTk3LWJjZTUtMzliYjg3ZWUxODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjFmZWJhNTctMWFmNC00MTk3LWJjZTUtMzliYjg3ZWUxODVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"TV Spot: Can't Turn"},"datePublished":"2013-02-22","description":"A group of college students, on a trip to the Mountain Man Festival on Halloween in West Virginia, encounter a clan of cannibals.","keywords":"topless female nudity,cannibal,rape,no survivors,female nudity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2375779/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfa120374"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Garbage Doesn't Even Begin To Describe It","reviewBody":"This latest installment of the Wrong Turn series sees a group of young campers get unwittingly mixed up in an unfortunate series of events when the leader of a group of cannibals gets arrested. The "rescue mission" becomes a game of life of death when the said cannibals come to their leader's aid.

Now, the 1st movie was really good...good acting with very believable characters, good suspense, and really good creepy moments and enough gore to keep the gore fest fans happy. This one, however, was completely at the other end of the scale. The plot is ridiculous, the characters just look totally out of place (even the main town inhabitants look as if they don't belong there), the acting is pretty damn awful, and the make-up for the cannibals is amateurish at best...in fact I've seen better Halloween masks made by kindergarten kids. This is, in fact, a very bad Friday The 13th movie with a different title and there were parts where I kept expecting Jason to pop out from behind a tree or a corner of a building at some point.

When watching this movie you realise that absolutely nothing about it makes any sense either and just two examples of that are: 1) a cop gets charged at by cannibals...cop just stands there saying "halt" with no weapon drawn, and 2) the town is full of people celebrating the Mountain Man Festival yet as the movie goes on, without any explanation, it suddenly becomes like a ghost town. There are obviously much more than that but I don't have the time or space to list them all, and I don't want to ruin it (ahem) for you.

I've seen some really terrible movies in my time but this one ranks up there with one of the worst I've ever seen. I knew just 5 minutes into the movie it was going to be bad, but I didn't think it would be as bad as it was. I just wish there was an option for 0 stars because this movie doesn't even deserve a 1-star rating.

Avoid this absolute drivel at all costs unless you want to endure 91 minutes of pain. Don't say you weren't warned.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19068,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler
Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy, Zach McGowan, Toby Schmitz, Clara Paget, Louise Barnes

programme.title: Opušteno
programme.desc: Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i... Reditelj Zander Leman i izvršni producent Džejson Rajtman (reditelj filmova "U vazduhu" i "Džuno") predstavljaju nam komediju "Opušteno", nominovanu za nagradu Zlatni globus, koja istražuje smešnu i čudnu dinamiku modernih porodica i odnosa unutar njih. Nedavno razvedena Valerija i njena 16-godišnja ćerka Lora se useljavaju kod Valerijinog brata Aleksa, večitog neženje i stručnjaka za usputne veze. Valerija i Aleks zajedno krstare kroz ludi svet izlazaka usput odgajajući njenu ćerku tinejdžerku.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Goldbergovi
programme.desc: Jednom ne tako davno i ne tako daleko 11-godišnji Adam Goldberg (Sean Giambrone) video-kamerom svojih roditelja dokumentira život na periferiji 1980-ih godina. Pratimo 3. sezonu humoristične serije za sve uzraste o bučnoj, toploj i pomalo neprilagođenoj obitelji u 80-ima. Pripovjedač nam govori o svojem životu s nametljivom majkom, razdražljivim ocem, buntovnom starijom sestrom, prenapetim starijim bratom i djedom zavodnikom. Goldbergovi su obožavatelji videorekordera, glazbenih kompilacija i elastana! Najmlađi sin Adam (Sean Giambrone), štreber opsjednut filmovima, i dalje se pokušava nositi sa životom školarca te dokumentira urnebesne i neugodne ispade svoje živopisne obitelji. Majka Beverly (Wendi McLendon-Covey) u punoj je formi kad se petlja u tuđe živote, nalazi ljudima partnere i zasljepljuje sve oko sebe, dok tata Murray (Jeff Garlin) odgaja djecu iz udobnog naslonjača na kojem sjedi samo u gaćama. Najstarije dijete Erica (Hayley Orrantia) napokon će se odvojiti od obitelji i otići na fakultet. Barry (Troy Gentile), srednje dijete, obuzet je osjećajima, kao i pisanjem domišljatih stihova te suosjeća s prijateljem Geoffom Schwartzom (Sam Lerner) kad njihove starije djevojke odu studirati. Najstariji je član obitelji omiljeni djed Al Solomon (George Segal), razuzdani član klana, besramni zavodnik koji uživa u trenucima s unucima gotovo jednako kao i u tjednim masažama. U ovoj sezoni djeca će se morati odupirati zagrljajima i pusicama dok pokušavaju odrasti u obitelji Goldberg.

credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

Nedavno razvedena Valerija i njena 16-godišnja ćerka Lora se useljavaju kod Valerijinog brata Aleksa, večitog neženje i stručnjaka za usputne veze. Valerija i Aleks zajedno krstare kroz ludi svet izlazaka usput odgajajući njenu ćerku tinejdžerku.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Brooklyn 99
programme.desc: Zakon i nered. U njujorškoj policijskoj postaji u Brooklynu svaki dan je poseban, svaki je drugačiji i u pravilu prilično kaotičan. Jake Peralta (Andy Samberg) talentirani je detektiv, zbog čega se nikad nije morao ubijati od posla i slijepo se držati pravila. Budući da je uhitio više zločinaca od kolega, tijekom karijere svi su ga držali kao kap vode na dlanu. Sve dok u postaju nije došao novi zapovjednik, kapetan Ray Holt (Andre Braugher). Kapetan Holt poštuje pravila i propise, koje su detektivi 99. postaje dugo zanemarivali. Jakeovi kolege vrsni su i sposobni detektivi, ali kronično im nedostaje reda i discipline. Međusobno se nadmeću, idu si na živce, tračaju i flertaju, ali u konačnici jedni druge štite. Detektivka Amy Santiago (Melissa Fumero), dežurna čistunka u postaji, oduševljena je novim vodstvom. Budući da je odrasla sa sedmoricom braće, voli se nadmetati u svakom smislu te riječi. Silno želi uhititi više zločinaca od Jakea i svjesna je koliko se mora potruditi da bi u tome uspjela. Holtov zamjenik, narednik Terry Jeffords (Terry Crews), stijena je od čovjeka, no povukao se u ured nakon što mu je žena rodila blizanke Cagney i Lacey, i to zbog silnoga straha da u suprotnome neće vidjeti kako mu kćeri odrastaju. U 99. postaji radi i detektiv Charles Boyle (Joe Lo Truglio), kojem je Jake idol. Charles je izrazito vrijedan - niti je genijalac niti je snažan, jednostavno se trudi više od drugih. Jako mu se sviđa bahata, opaka i seksi detektivka Rosa Diaz (Stephanie Beatriz), ali on kod nje nema ama baš nikakve šanse. A u policijske posle nos neprestano zabada ekscentrična i umišljena tajnica Gina Linetti (Chelsea Peretti).

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Goldbergovi
programme.desc: Jednom ne tako davno i ne tako daleko 11-godišnji Adam Goldberg (Sean Giambrone) video-kamerom svojih roditelja dokumentira život na periferiji 1980-ih godina. Pratimo 3. sezonu humoristične serije za sve uzraste o bučnoj, toploj i pomalo neprilagođenoj obitelji u 80-ima. Pripovjedač nam govori o svojem životu s nametljivom majkom, razdražljivim ocem, buntovnom starijom sestrom, prenapetim starijim bratom i djedom zavodnikom. Goldbergovi su obožavatelji videorekordera, glazbenih kompilacija i elastana! Najmlađi sin Adam (Sean Giambrone), štreber opsjednut filmovima, i dalje se pokušava nositi sa životom školarca te dokumentira urnebesne i neugodne ispade svoje živopisne obitelji. Majka Beverly (Wendi McLendon-Covey) u punoj je formi kad se petlja u tuđe živote, nalazi ljudima partnere i zasljepljuje sve oko sebe, dok tata Murray (Jeff Garlin) odgaja djecu iz udobnog naslonjača na kojem sjedi samo u gaćama. Najstarije dijete Erica (Hayley Orrantia) napokon će se odvojiti od obitelji i otići na fakultet. Barry (Troy Gentile), srednje dijete, obuzet je osjećajima, kao i pisanjem domišljatih stihova te suosjeća s prijateljem Geoffom Schwartzom (Sam Lerner) kad njihove starije djevojke odu studirati. Najstariji je član obitelji omiljeni djed Al Solomon (George Segal), razuzdani član klana, besramni zavodnik koji uživa u trenucima s unucima gotovo jednako kao i u tjednim masažama. U ovoj sezoni djeca će se morati odupirati zagrljajima i pusicama dok pokušavaju odrasti u obitelji Goldberg.

credits.actor: Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones, Christina Hendricks, Michael Gladis, Rosemarie DeWitt, Talia Balsam

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler
Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy, Zach McGowan, Toby Schmitz, Clara Paget, Louise Barnes
